languages.text: "Что? Вопросы? Какие еще, в бездну, вопросы?!" {n}В голосе Саргоны явственно проклевываются истерические нотки, но рычаг он все еще не опускает.{/n}
"What? Questions? What in the void are you talking about?" {n}Palpable hysteria breaks through Sargona's voice, but he does not pull the lever just yet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Что? Вопросы? Какие еще, в бездну, вопросы?!" {n}В голосе Саргоны явственно проклевываются истерические нотки, но рычаг он все еще не опускает.{/n}

"What? Questions? What in the void are you talking about?" {n}Palpable hysteria breaks through Sargona's voice, but he does not pull the lever just yet.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Qué? ¿Preguntas? Pero ¿se puede saber de qué estás hablando?». {n}La histeria se hace evidente en la voz de Sargona, pero aún no tira de la palanca.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Questions? What in the void are you talking about?" {n}Palpable hysteria breaks through Sargona's voice, but he does not pull the lever just yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? ¿Preguntas? Pero ¿se puede saber de qué estás hablando?». {n}La histeria se hace evidente en la voz de Sargona, pero aún no tira de la palanca.{/n}

languages.text: “问题？什么问题？你到底在说什么胡话？”{n}萨戈纳的声音明显变得歇斯底里，但他并没有拉动操纵杆。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Questions? What in the void are you talking about?" {n}Palpable hysteria breaks through Sargona's voice, but he does not pull the lever just yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “问题？什么问题？你到底在说什么胡话？”{n}萨戈纳的声音明显变得歇斯底里，但他并没有拉动操纵杆。{/n}

languages.text: « Des questions ? Quelles questions ? Où voulez-vous en venir, à la fin ? » {n}Une hystérie palpable transparaît dans la voix de Sargona, mais il n'actionne pas le levier pour autant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Questions? What in the void are you talking about?" {n}Palpable hysteria breaks through Sargona's voice, but he does not pull the lever just yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Des questions ? Quelles questions ? Où voulez-vous en venir, à la fin ? » {n}Une hystérie palpable transparaît dans la voix de Sargona, mais il n'actionne pas le levier pour autant.{/n}

languages.text: 「何だ？質問か？ヴォイドの中の何について話すつもりだ？」{n}サルゴナの声に明らかなヒステリーが混じるが、彼はまだレバーを引こうとはしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Questions? What in the void are you talking about?" {n}Palpable hysteria breaks through Sargona's voice, but he does not pull the lever just yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「何だ？質問か？ヴォイドの中の何について話すつもりだ？」{n}サルゴナの声に明らかなヒステリーが混じるが、彼はまだレバーを引こうとはしない。{/n}

languages.text: "Ne? Soru mu? Uçsuz aşkına... Ne diyorsun sen?" {n}Sargona'nın sesine belirgin bir histeri hâkim oluyor. Aynı zamanda henüz kolu çekmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Questions? What in the void are you talking about?" {n}Palpable hysteria breaks through Sargona's voice, but he does not pull the lever just yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Soru mu? Uçsuz aşkına... Ne diyorsun sen?" {n}Sargona'nın sesine belirgin bir histeri hâkim oluyor. Aynı zamanda henüz kolu çekmiyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Was? Fragen? Wovon in der Leere redet Ihr?" {n}Sargonas Stimme klingt zunehmend hysterisch, aber noch zieht er nicht an dem Hebel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What? Questions? What in the void are you talking about?" {n}Palpable hysteria breaks through Sargona's voice, but he does not pull the lever just yet.{/n}
